title: Cgpa
content: I have 7 cgpa and i am currently in 4th semester. Can i get a tier 1 offer and what is the minimum cgpa from where t1 companies start hiring

comments.body:
I think you need an 8+. Although your current GPA is enough to qualify for the test, it might not be enough to get shortlisted for interviews. A few companies are known to explicitly shortlist 9+ GPA candidates. 

My suggestion would be to score as much as possible over the next 3 semesters and lift your GPA to atleast an 8+
Maintain 7 cgpa you will get it donâ€™t worry I was having 6.48
